name: immich-frame
tagline: A digital photo frame powered by Immich for displaying albums
description: ImmichFrame turns a device into a digital photo frame powered by Immich. It displays selected albums or recent uploads in a slideshow style UI, ideal for wall mounted tablets or always on screens showing your self hosted photo library.

features.title: Digital Photo Frame
features.description: Displays photos from an Immich library in a continuous slideshow format

features.title: Slideshow Playback
features.description: Automatically cycles through selected photos without user interaction

features.title: Album Selection
features.description: Limits displayed photos to chosen Immich albums

features.title: Fullscreen Display
features.description: Optimized for kiosk screens wall displays and tablets

features.title: Immich API Usage
features.description: Retrieves photo data using Immich APIs

features.title: Browser-Based Viewer
features.description: Runs as a web application in a browser environment

features.title: Minimal Controls
features.description: Focuses on passive viewing rather than active navigation

features.title: Self-Hosted Photo Frame
features.description: Uses photos hosted on your own Immich infrastructure
